properties.displayName: Enable audit category group resource logging for supported resources to Event Hub
properties.description: Resource logs should be enabled to track activities and events that take place on your resources and give you visibility and insights into any changes that occur. This initiative deploys diagnostic setting using the audit category group to route logs to Event Hub for all supported resources

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy
Resource Location must be in the same location as the Event Hub Namespace.

Event Hub Authorization Rule Id - the authorization rule needs to be at Event Hub namespace level. e.g. /subscriptions/{subscription Id}/resourceGroups/{resource group}/providers/Microsoft.EventHub/namespaces/{Event Hub namespace}/authorizationrules/{authorization rule}
List of Resource Types to be evaluated for diagnostic setting existence.
